TransactionStateContext.DepositState: Triggered when users send Ether to the contract or call Deposit().
TransactionStateContext.WithdrawalState: Activated when users withdraw tokens or Ether using WitdrawTokenToHolder or WithdrawToHolder.

ExternalInteractions.Description: The contract performs external token transfers and sends Ether to specified addresses. These interactions happen within WithdrawToken and WithdrawToHolder functions.
Vulnerabilities: Unchecked low-level calls during token transfers and Ether transfers pose a security risk.
